name: Seconds (EmmanuelSilva)
description:
How to Play:

Survive hordes of enemies trying to kill till the 20 second mark

- Shooting (Rightclick)

- Shotgun  (Leftclick)

- Movement (WASD)

This is my first jam so the game its nothing fancy
